Hi.

Would it be possible to add multiple ExtractorImpliedURI extractors to one crawl.
I have a website where a trigger-URI should generate 3 other URIs.

Could this be done by adding three extractors with the same trigger ? - or even more logical three build-patterns from the same trigger

best
